text: Is anyone here familiar with CSV.jl? Is there a way to iterate through each row element by element? Basically, I need to access the elements of each row in order but I don’t know before reading the file how many columns there will be.

elements.text: Is anyone here familiar with CSV.jl? Is there a way to iterate through each row element by element? Basically, I need to access the elements of each row in order but I don’t know before reading the file how many columns there will be.
